paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is one of the recurrent pathogenic mutations identified in the study.
key_quotes: We identified eight recurrent pathogenic mutations including two in BRCA2 (c.8363G>A, c.2414delC).
